#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>

// Define maximum possible N. Let's assume N is up to 1e5, but adjust as needed.
#define MAX_N 100000

typedef struct {
    int *neighbors;
    int size;
    int capacity;
} EdgeList;

EdgeList edges[MAX_N];

int degrees[MAX_N];
int flag[MAX_N];
int parity[MAX_N];

// Heap implementation
typedef struct {
    int degree;
    int node;
} HeapElement;

HeapElement heap[MAX_N];
int heap_size;

void swap(HeapElement *a, HeapElement *b) {
    HeapElement temp = *a;
    *a = *b;
    *b = temp;
}

void heapify_up(int idx) {
    while (idx > 0) {
        int parent = (idx - 1) / 2;
        if (heap[parent].degree <= heap[idx].degree) break;
        swap(&heap[parent], &heap[idx]);
        idx = parent;
    }
}

void heapify_down(int idx) {
    int smallest = idx;
    int left = 2 * idx + 1;
    int right = 2 * idx + 2;
    if (left < heap_size && heap[left].degree < heap[smallest].degree)
        smallest = left;
    if (right < heap_size && heap[right].degree < heap[smallest].degree)
        smallest = right;
    if (smallest != idx) {
        swap(&heap[smallest], &heap[idx]);
        heapify_down(smallest);
    }
}

void heap_push(HeapElement elem) {
    heap[heap_size] = elem;
    heapify_up(heap_size++);
}

HeapElement heap_pop() {
    HeapElement root = heap[0];
    heap[0] = heap[--heap_size];
    heapify_down(0);
    return root;
}

            edges[a].neighbors = realloc(edges[a].neighbors, edges[a].capacity * sizeof(int));
        }

        // Add to edges[b]

            edges[b].neighbors = realloc(edges[b].neighbors, edges[b].capacity * sizeof(int));
        }
        edges[b].neighbors[edges[b].size++] = a;
        // Update degrees
        degrees[a]++;
        degrees[b]++;
    }
